title: Quizopolis
description: An electrifying quiz competition which features multiple rounds, each with a unique and interactive format to keep participants on their toes. Every round promises a new twist. As the rounds progress, the questions become more complex, ensuring a thrilling and competitive atmosphere.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: The quiz consists of multiple rounds.
Each round will have a unique and interactive format.
As rounds progress, questions will become more complex.
Participants must answer within the given time limit.
